title: Prepared 4 Eternity
home_text: Welcome to your "Prepared 4 Eternity" home page. Reaching this far, you have already accomplished the first steps in your journey to know Jesus. The game opens on the the Romans Road to Salvation for all players, because this is a highly effective tool for exposing loved ones to the essential Gospel and the most significant journey of their existence.
invite_text: This page will serve as the main hub for all of your game needs. From here you can start a new game, load a saved game, or tailor certain game settings to suit your preference. If you are new to the game, we recommend starting with the tutorial. If you are ready to start a new game, click the "New Game" button below.
vision_text: Prepare yourself for an exciting journey...
